TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor

Docs.summary: Allows a type converter to access schema information stored on an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> classes. These implementations are used by the .NET Framework and are not intended for use in your code.

Docs.summary: When implemented, gets or sets the schema associated with the object.
